titles.title: Federal Savings Association Charter Flexibility Act of 2016
A bill to amend the Home Owners' Loan Act to allow Federal savings associations to elect to operate as national banks, and for other purposes.
Federal Savings Association Charter Flexibility Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Federal Savings Association Charter Flexibility Act of 2016
This bill amends the Home Owners' Loan Act to permit a federal savings association to elect to operate subject to supervision by the Comptroller of the Currency with the rights and duties of a national bank.
